title: Can't find the error message in x32dbg
content:
Am trying to reverse an activation program using the error message in reference string

but searching for the string is not successful "all modules - string reference" tried to pause after reaching the error and adding breakpoint through handles but no luck yet

comments.text: It could be a resource string, loaded with e.g. LoadString, a good starting point might be to open the binary with a tool like Resource Hacker.
Or the string could be obfuscated
